title: Restoration Study of Siberian Baroque Temples: Modeling-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of architectural history and fundamental design principles
context.additional_context: Non-degree course for in-service professionals, flexibly delivered to large-scale learners via online platforms

learning_goals: Analyze and explain the compositional characteristics of 18th-19th century Siberian Baroque church architecture
Reconstruct the exterior of a lost temple using 3D modeling tools and produce visual materials
Implement functional and structural design models in stages for historical architectural restoration projects

resources: Historical Architectural Blueprints and Photographic Archive
Online collaboration tools (Miro, Google Jamboard, etc.)
LMS Platform (LMS Features: Assignment Submission, Feedback, Discussion Board)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
